name: Non Casual Encounter: Prologue
overview: The Non Casual Encounter experience includes an introduction, a preamble; in short: a prologue. It is not entirely a demo, although it actually functions to showing what the game is like. It is a small original story that serves as a presentation to the real deal, and we consider it worth publishing in retail physical format. Non casual encounter - Prologue You could say it is like an aperitif before the main course. A funny preface that breaks the fourth wall with the complicity of the player and sets the stage for what will eventually be revealed in the final game. We know this is a short and cute experience, but we are sure that many Dreamcast fans wish to acquire it before the arrival of Non Casual Encounter.
